TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Sacrifices 4 Slave units to create a Behemoth unit[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Can only by cast by a civ lead by Jamal Dahkar

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Click on another unit in the stack and use their "Designate Target Spell" to choose who to buff[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Berserker needs Body and Force mana to use[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Protector needs Earth and Law mana to use[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Assassin needs Shadow and Air mana to use
